items.content_html: It is a lightweight password input field that supports password generation through password managers. Use Lit.
items.title: mirko-san/mi-password-input: It is a lightweight password input field that supports password generation through password managers. Use Lit.

items.content_html: A lightweight URL shortener project built using Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. This project allows users to shorten long URLs and provides a redirect to the original website. Features include a user-friendly interface, MongoDB storage, and a RESTful API architecture. Easy to set up and deploy.
items.title: Ayushman2004/BitLink: A lightweight URL shortener project built using Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. This project allows users to shorten long URLs and provides a redirect to the original website. Features include a user-friendly interface, MongoDB storage, and a RESTful API architecture. Easy to set up and deploy.

items.content_html: React Caches is a lightweight and easy-to-use package that simplifies the management of local storage and cache storage in your React-based applications. With this package, you can easily access and manage data stored in local storage, cache storage, and other local storage used by JavaScript.
items.title: AnkanSaha/react-caches: React Caches is a lightweight and easy-to-use package that simplifies the management of local storage and cache storage in your React-based applications. With this package, you can easily access and manage data stored in local storage, cache storage, and other local storage used by JavaScript.

items.content_html: A basic React/Typescript/Vite application for fetching stock quotes from AlphaVantage and displaying historical data with the TradingView Lightweight Chart library.
items.title: incrementalcapitalist/alphavantage-lightweight-chart: A basic React/Typescript/Vite application for fetching stock quotes from AlphaVantage and displaying historical data with the TradingView Lightweight Chart library.

items.content_html: A lightweight page object implementation with a focus on simplicity and extensibility
items.title: bendemboski/fractal-page-object: A lightweight page object implementation with a focus on simplicity and extensibility

items.content_html: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.
items.title: ioak-io/basicui: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.

items.content_html: Dashify is a lightweight library for building customizable admin dashboards.
items.title: dashify-web/dashify: Dashify is a lightweight library for building customizable admin dashboards.

items.content_html: Nanotron: Your Lightweight, High-Performance Micro/Nano Service Framework
items.title: Alwatr/nanotron: Nanotron: Your Lightweight, High-Performance Micro/Nano Service Framework

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
items.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).

items.content_html: Fast and lightweight key-value database library.
items.title: miftahDB/miftahdb: Fast and lightweight key-value database library.

items.content_html: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
items.title: talentedaamer/javascript-confirm: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
